pages.text: Vacuum Hoppers are handy devices that, as their name indicates, absorb items from significant distances. A Vacuum Hopper will teleport any one item within a 4 block radious into itself, it will attempt to do this every 20 ticks

pages.title: Vacuum Hopper
pages.text: What else do you want me to say, it is a vacuum hopper, every other mod in existence has one.
